message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product, and I believe it's worth every penny. I'm willing to start with a price of $15000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay $8000 for it. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand you're on a tight budget, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can do $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9000?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting a bit too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I can do $11000. Is that a price you'd be willing to meet?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500?
I've made a few concessions already, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $10500, but that's as low as I can go. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $10500, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9750?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too close to the end of the negotiation, and I'm not sure I can make any more concessions. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but that's as low as I can go. If you're interested, we can finalize the deal now. Otherwise, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500?
